HDG.QB.content: [Heidegger’s method as Destruction then building (for dwelling)?] build path (Weg) leads back to locality (Ortschaft) of recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics to let us journey through what is destined in overcoming (Überwindung) nihilism [not there yet, narrative yet to come] > despite rejection of text for publication [annihilation of trace], he who learns must examine more originarily, w/ greater care, the saying of reflective thinking, might leave such saying in realm of mystery one day, as highest gift (höchstes Geschenk) & greatest danger [beyond Being, the worst, totally other, risk annihilation?]

HDG.CCP.content: [will as cause & effect] every will wants to actualize, have actuality as its element > the risk that Gelassenheit sounds like the denial of the will to live [Schopenhauer] > power of action & resolve also reign in Gelassenheit [these will mistakenly seem to pertain to will]

HDG.LP.content: thinking dialogue w/ poetry always risks interfering w/ Sage of Gedicht, rather than letting it sing from its proper peace (eigenen Ruhe) > Erörterung of Gedicht can never substitute (ersetzen) or guide (leiten) our listening (Hören) to the poem, can make our Hören more thought-provoking/reflective (besinnlicher) [prosthesis, substitute]

HDG.WL.content: Heidegger comments on risk of calling Sprachwesen Saying, might we be elevating language to a fantastical, self-sustained being (Wesen) that can’t be encountered > but language is bound up w/ human speaking, needs human speaking > perhaps we miss the very nature of language when we ask after grounds > or is Sage: the abode of rest (Be-Ruhende), grants the quiet of mutual belonging to all w/in Gefüge des Sprachwesens?
